titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bayderm Bottom 10 UD.
To suspend temporarily the duty on Bayderm Bottom 10 UD.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Aqueous polyurethane dispersions containing 29% or greater content of Hexanedioic acid, polymer with N-(2-aminoethyl)-1,2-ethanediamine, 2-butene-1,4-diol, 1,6-diisocyanatohexane, 1,2-ethanediol, 1,3-isobenzofurandione, methyloxirane, oxirane and sodium hydrogen sulfite, 2-(2-butoxyethoxy)ethanol-blocked (Bayderm Bottom 10 UD.)
